name: Fandom Wikia Unbloated
description: Locks the top navbar, removes the "ads" linking from your current Wikia location to other Fandom pages, including the massive top banner, the footer bar and the sidebar, and makes the articles full-width to counter the empty space created when removing the sidebar. (Primarily released so I can move it to another computer I use.)
additional_info:
Version 3 released 18 September 2022, block new righthand sidebar
Version 2 released 20 April 2019, added domain fandom.com
Version 1 released 26 January 2017
